item.title: ChunkText function
item.description: Release of a new function: ChunkText. This function takes a dialogue string and outputs it in chunks of 3 characters at a time, with various options to adjust it. It's intended to give text a more robotic feel.

item.title: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 announcement
item.description: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 will be happening soon! See the event's page for the rules and timeframe.

item.title: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 has begun
item.description: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 has begun!

item.title: Leaky Pipe v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new Hydrate shell, Leaky Pipe. A pipe that sticks to the top of the screen and drops down liquid occasionally!

item.title: Stratospheric Delivery v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new Hydrate shell, Stratospheric Delivery. A free-floating cloud with dressups for rain in various colors, and different colors of cloud!

item.title: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 has ended
item.description: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 has ended! There is a 1 hour grace period to finish submissions before the form closes.

item.title: Stock Pot v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new Hydrate shell, Stock Pot. A stock pot with dressups for a lid and steam!

item.title: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam afterword
item.description: The results of 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 are here! A few thoughts after tying up the event.

item.title: Aughost 2025 afterword
item.description: Aughost 2025 has ended! Some brief commentary at the end of the event.

item.title: Hydrate v2.0.0
item.description: A major update to Hydrate has been released, kicking off a long-overdue overhaul. This update includes deprecation of some old functions.

item.title: Hydrate v2.0.1
item.description: A major update to Hydrate has been released, with some breaking changes to the stat share event that was introduced in the previous update, as well as new features and bug fixes.

item.title: FormatLinks updated
item.description: An update to the function FormatLinks, cleaning up the code and making it not rely on compatible.dic.

item.title: Hydrate v2.0.2
item.description: A minor update to Hydrate has been released, bringing some new quality of life changes and cleaner code.

item.title: Hydrate v2.0.3
item.description: A major update to Hydrate has been released, bringing options to let Hydrate randomly change shells/dressups for you at configurable intervals, and more.

item.title: Hydrate v2.0.4
item.description: A major update to Hydrate has been released, with a final breaking change to the stat share event, finer timing control of the auto shell/dressup changes, and legacy content now toggleable.

item.title: EncodeMorse & DecodeMorse functions
item.description: Release of a new set of functions: EncodeMorse & DecodeMorse. These functions can change text to and from morse code, and may be customized to add new codes.

item.title: Wanted: Dead, Alive, or Other v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new ghost: Wanted: Dead, Alive, or Other. Necromancy is tiring work, mostly because it takes so long to interview candidates and select the best ones. But it is a necessary process, otherwise research results will be chaotic and rather useless... Best get to it, then.

item.title: SSP Angel v1.1.3
item.description: A minor update to SSP Angel has been released, updating various terms to match the new SSP English translations, and clarifying or correcting other information. A small amount of new idle dialogue has been added as well.

item.title: Wanted: Dead, Alive, or Other v1.0.1
item.description: An update to Wanted: Dead, Alive, or Other has been released, smoothing out jam bugs and adding some new content.

item.title: Needle Day 2025
item.description: Needle Day 2025 has arrived, bringing with it Needle v1.1.5 and 11 new Needle shells.

item.title: Corkscrew v1.0.1
item.description: An update to the shell Corkscrew, adding several new colors and some other options for variation.

item.title: Needloon (readable) v1.0.1
item.description: An update to the shell Needloon (readable), fixing a longstanding issue with visited anchors having the wrong shadow style.

item.title: Music player v2.0.4
item.description: An update to my music player code, fixing several bugs, as well as bringing some formatting cleanup and other small improvements.

item.title: FLUX v2.0.0
item.description: A major overhaul for FLUX, bringing many new features to the music player, adding a Spanish translation, and deprecating several old functions.

item.title: 2025 development retrospective
item.description: A retrospective on my development activities in 2025, including things I released, things I updated, things I learned, etc.
